name: Bow Em'
description:
Shoot your weapon and try to survive for as long as you can!

Controls: WSAD/Arrows -> movement, LMB -> shoot, 1 -> longbow, 2 -> shortbow

Longbow => 1-shots up to 3 enemies but has 2 seconds reload time!

Shortbow => 2-shots enemies but has very short reload speed!

Arrows => you can have 30 arrows maximum and wooden arrow boxes replenish your ammo
